Baseline.name: baseline
Baseline.selection: MET>=250 and MT>=150 and Njets>=2 and DPhi_jmet>=0.5 and trigger and tmod>-1000 and Mlb>=0

Region.name: SR1l
Region.selection: Nbjets>=1 and NLeps==1 and NVLeps==1 and TrackVeto and TauVeto and ( (lep1_MediumID and abs(lep1_pdgid)==11) or (lep1_TightID and abs(lep1_pdgid)==13) )

Bin.name: _AB_
Bin.label: _AB_
Bin.selection: Njets!>=3 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and ( (Mlb>175 and tightCSVV2()) or Mlb!>=175 )

Bin.name: _CD_
Bin.label: _CD_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and tmod!>0 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and ( (Mlb>175 and tightCSVV2()) or Mlb!>=175 )

Bin.name: _EFGH_
Bin.label: _EFGH_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and tmod>0 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and ( (Mlb>175 and tightCSVV2()) or Mlb!>=175 )

Bin.name: _CDEFGH_
Bin.label: _CD_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and ( (Mlb>175 and tightCSVV2()) or Mlb!>=175 )

Bin.name: _NJlowTM_
Bin.label: _NJlowTM_
Bin.selection: tmod!>0 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and ( (Mlb>175 and tightCSVV2()) or Mlb!>=175 )

Bin.name: _NJmidTM_
Bin.label: _NJmidTM_
Bin.selection: tmod>0 and tmod!>10 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and ( (Mlb>175 and tightCSVV2()) or Mlb!>=175 )

Bin.name: _NJhighTM_
Bin.label: _NJhighTM_
Bin.selection: tmod>10 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and ( (Mlb>175 and tightCSVV2()) or Mlb!>=175 )

Bin.name: _NJ_
Bin.label: _NJ_
Bin.selection: DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and ( (Mlb>175 and tightCSVV2()) or Mlb!>=175 )
